text: William S. "Bill" Broomfield, (April 28, 1922 - February 20, 2019) was an American politician. He represented the U.S. state of Michigan in the United States House of Representatives from 1957 through 1993. Broomfield died on February 20, 2019 in Kensington, Maryland at the age of 96.William Broomfield, former House GOP foreign policy guru, dies ==References== ==Other websites== *H.R. 4884 renaming post office for Broomfield Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:United States representatives from Michigan Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Royal Oak, Michigan
title: William Broomfield
